originalText.text: Dr. Lyubov Avshalumova And her staff was completely rude! I walked in as a new patient for. 10:30 appointment. At 10:50 I was called to the dest to pay my copay of $15 no problem! The receptionist said I can Zelle the $15 to avoid the 3.xx% fee to use my card or pay cash. I informed her my financial institution does not allow me to Zelle a business and nowhere was it advertised to pay with cash or be charged a fee. Either way I hand my card and told her my take on it’s illegal to charge a fee for using a card. At which point the receptionist went and got Dr. Lyubov Avshalumova who then asked if I had a question I said I did not nor did I understand why the receptionist when and got her. She then tried to demean me by having the other receptionist using a calculator tell her with the math is on the fee and tell me I am arguing with her about .59¢ then say don’t worry I’ll wave the fee this time. Like it’s doing me a favor if it’s just .59¢ you should be charging your patient ls to begin with. It’s the PRINCIPLE SHE EXTREMELY RUDE WASTED 30 minutes of my time!

originalText.text: I am so glad to be here is the best place to be and we are so blessings to help the community to be fit and healthy

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Dr Avshalumva for about 2-3 years now. She is patient, kind and so talented. My face has needed a lot of work and she explains everything she’s going to do before she does it and always has time for questions. she always takes the time to make me feel as comfortable as she can. My husband is now her patient. I am never going to another dermatologist ever.

originalText.text: I have been going to Dr. Avshalumova for too many years to count & there is nobody else I’d trust more. She is the most helpful, thorough dermatologist I have been to. She’s so knowledgeable and can explain everything to me in a way I understand and feel comfortable with. The staff is incredible and friendly, the office is nice and in a great location downtown. Highly recommend her to everyone!

Highly recommend her to everyone!

originalText.text: Amazing experience with Dr. Avshalumova as always! She was very kind and understanding of my feelings for what I came in for and made sure I felt comfortable. She's very knowledgable in her field and gave me solid facts on what I was worried about to reassure and educate me so I understood it better. She got to the real bottom of the issue and helped me fix it. Will continue returning :)
